tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE attendances (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    attended BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE student_attendance_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    class_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(20)
);
